languages.text: "Он меня... перекроил. Подселил в плоть колонии мутагенных инфекций. Накачал химикатами. Разрезал и вынул части. Облучил. Не знаю, что еще он делал... Это было долго. Мучительно. Когда все закончилось, я не помнил начала".

traits.locale_text: "Он меня... перекроил. Подселил в плоть колонии мутагенных инфекций. Накачал химикатами. Разрезал и вынул части. Облучил. Не знаю, что еще он делал... Это было долго. Мучительно. Когда все закончилось, я не помнил начала".
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "He... remade me. He put colonies of mutagenic infection into my flesh. Pumped me full of chemicals. Cut me open and took out some pieces. Irradiated me. I do not know what else he did... He took his time. It was painful. By the time he finished, I could not remember how he had started."
languages.original_text: "Он меня... перекроил. Подселил в плоть колонии мутагенных инфекций. Накачал химикатами. Разрезал и вынул части. Облучил. Не знаю, что еще он делал... Это было долго. Мучительно. Когда все закончилось, я не помнил начала".

traits.locale_text: "He... remade me. Put colonies of mutagenic infection into my flesh. Pumped me with chemicals. Cut me open and took out some pieces. Irradiated me. I do not know what else he did... He took his time. It was painful. By the time he finished, I could not remember how he started."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

I do not know what else he did... He took his time. It was painful. By the time he finished, I could not remember how he had started."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: 「奴は…俺を改造した。俺の肉体に変異原性感染のコロニーを入れ、化学薬品をたっぷりと注入した。それから切開して破片を取り出し、放射線を照射した。他に何をされたかは知らないが…やりたい放題だったよ。激しい痛みだった。終わるころには、事の起こりを思い出すことも出来なかった」
languages.original_text: "He... remade me. He put colonies of mutagenic infection into my flesh. Pumped me full of chemicals. Cut me open and took out some pieces. Irradiated me. I do not know what else he did... He took his time. It was painful. By the time he finished, I could not remember how he had started."

traits.locale_text: 「奴は…俺を改造した。俺の肉体に変異原性感染のコロニーを入れ、化学薬品をたっぷりと注入した。それから切開して破片を取り出し、放射線を照射した。他に何をされたかは知らないが…やりたい放題だったよ。激しい痛みだった。終わるころには、事の起こりを思い出すことも出来なかった」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: “他……他重塑了我的身体，在我的血肉中植入了诱变菌群。他给我注射各种各样的化学物质，还把我剖开，取出某些器官，将我暴露在辐射之下。我不知道他还做了什么别的事情……他花了很长时间，整个过程非常痛苦。等他结束的时候，我已经不记得这一切是怎么开始的了。”
languages.original_text: "He... remade me. He put colonies of mutagenic infection into my flesh. Pumped me full of chemicals. Cut me open and took out some pieces. Irradiated me. I do not know what else he did... He took his time. It was painful. By the time he finished, I could not remember how he had started."

traits.locale_text: “他……他重塑了我的身体，在我的血肉中植入了诱变菌群。他给我注射化学药品，还把我剖开，取出某些器官，将我暴露在辐射之下。我不知道他还做了什么别的事情……他花了很长时间，整个过程非常痛苦。等他结束的时候，我已经不记得这一切是怎么开始的了。”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: «Me... me rehízo. Inyectó colonias de infección mutagénica en mi carne. Me llenó de productos químicos. Me abrió para quitarme unas partes. Me irradió. No sé qué más me hizo... se tomó su tiempo. Fue doloroso. Para cuando acabó, ya no recordaba cómo había empezado».
languages.original_text: "He... remade me. He put colonies of mutagenic infection into my flesh. Pumped me full of chemicals. Cut me open and took out some pieces. Irradiated me. I do not know what else he did... He took his time. It was painful. By the time he finished, I could not remember how he had started."

traits.locale_text: «Me... me rehízo. Inyectó colonias de infección mutagénica en mi carne. Me llenó de químicos. Me abrió para quitarme unas partes. Me irradió. No sé qué más me hizo... se tomó su tiempo. Fue doloroso. Para cuando acabó, ya no recordaba cómo había empezado».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Er hat mich ... neu erschaffen. Er hat Kolonien mutagener Infektionen in mein Fleisch eingebracht. Hat mich mit Chemikalien vollgepumpt. Mich aufgeschnitten und ein paar Stücke herausgenommen. Mich bestrahlt. Ich weiß nicht, was er noch alles getan hat ... Er hat sich Zeit gelassen. Es war schmerzhaft. Als er fertig war, wusste ich schon nicht mehr, wie er angefangen hatte."
languages.original_text: "He... remade me. He put colonies of mutagenic infection into my flesh. Pumped me full of chemicals. Cut me open and took out some pieces. Irradiated me. I do not know what else he did... He took his time. It was painful. By the time he finished, I could not remember how he had started."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat mich ... neu erschaffen. Er hat Kolonien mutagener Infektionen in mein Fleisch eingebracht. Mich mit Chemikalien vollgepumpt. Mich aufgeschnitten und ein paar Stücke herausgenommen. Mich bestrahlt. Ich weiß nicht, was er noch alles getan hat ... Er hat sich Zeit gelassen. Es war schmerzhaft. Als er fertig war, wusste ich schon nicht mehr, wie er angefangen hatte."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: « Il m'a... refaçonné. Il a injecté des colonies d'infections mutagènes dans ma chair. Il m'a inoculé toutes sortes de produits chimiques. Il m'a ouvert et a prélevé différents morceaux. Il m'a irradié. Je ne sais pas ce qu'il a fait d'autre... Il a pris son temps. C'était douloureux. Quand enfin il a fini, je ne me souvenais déjà plus de la façon dont il avait commencé. »
languages.original_text: "He... remade me. He put colonies of mutagenic infection into my flesh. Pumped me full of chemicals. Cut me open and took out some pieces. Irradiated me. I do not know what else he did... He took his time. It was painful. By the time he finished, I could not remember how he had started."

traits.locale_text: « Il m'a... refaçonné. Il a injecté des colonies d'infections mutagènes dans ma chair. Il m'a inoculé des produits chimiques. Il m'a ouvert et a prélevé des morceaux. Il m'a irradié. Je ne sais pas ce qu'il a fait d'autre... Il a pris son temps. C'était douloureux. Quand enfin il a fini, je ne me souvenais déjà plus de la façon dont il avait commencé. »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Beni... Baştan yarattı. Etime sayısız mutasyon barındıran enfeksiyonlar enjekte etti. Beni kimyasal bileşenlerle doldurdu. İçimi açıp birkaç parça çıkardı. Radyasyona maruz bıraktı. Başka neler yaptığını bilmiyorum. Hiç acele etmedi. Çok acı çektim. Benimle işi bittiğinde nasıl başladığını bile hatırlayamıyordum."
languages.original_text: "He... remade me. He put colonies of mutagenic infection into my flesh. Pumped me full of chemicals. Cut me open and took out some pieces. Irradiated me. I do not know what else he did... He took his time. It was painful. By the time he finished, I could not remember how he had started."

traits.locale_text: "O... Beni baştan yarattı. Etime mutasyon kolonileriyle dolu enfeksiyonlar enjekte etti. Beni kimyasal bileşenlerle doldurdu. İçimi açıp birkaç parça çıkardı. Beni radyasyona maruz bıraktı. Başka neler yaptığını bilmiyorum. Hiç acele etmedi. Çok acı çektim. Benimle işi bittiğinde nasıl başladığını bile hatırlayamıyordum."
traits.speaker: WrackServant
